patrilex
Class MultilingAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      patrilex.MultilingAnalyzer

public class MultilingAnalyzer
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer

Implements an analyzer where the language can be selected at initializing

Constructor Detail

MultilingAnalyzer

public MultilingAnalyzer()
Constructor without specifying language Language is set to English as default. Initializes the corresponding Lemmatizer and the set of stop words.

MultilingAnalyzer

public MultilingAnalyzer(java.lang.String language)
Constructor with a String specifying language. If the String is no valid language (see class Language), the language is set to English. Initializes the corresponding Lemmatizer and the set of stop words.

MultilingAnalyzer

public MultilingAnalyzer(Language language)
Constructor with specified language. Initializes the corresponding Lemmatizer and the set of stop words.

Method Detail

tokenStream

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream tokenStream(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                          java.io.Reader reader)
Method tokenStream Depending on language the text is normalized and lemmatized. Normalizations for the different languages: UNL: Lowercasing EN: Lowercasing & remove accents ES: Lowercasing & remove accents RU: Lowercasing AR: Remove vowels

Specified by:
tokenStream in class org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer

analyze

public java.lang.String analyze(java.lang.String input,
                                java.lang.String fieldName)
Method analyze Gives the input to the analyze and returns the resulting TokenStream in a String where Tokens are sperated by whitespaces.

analyze

public java.lang.String analyze(java.lang.String input)
Method analyze Gives the input to the analyze and returns the resulting TokenStream in a String where Tokens are sperated by whitespaces. Uses the default field.

analyzeList

public java.util.LinkedList analyzeList(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                        java.lang.String input)
Method analyzeList Gives the input to the analyze and returns the resulting TokenStream in a LinkedList, every Token is an item in the list.

analyzeSet

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet analyzeSet(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                          java.lang.String input)
Method analyzeSet Gives the input to the analyze and returns the resulting TokenStream in a CharArraySet, every Token is an item in the set.
